Desde asesinos camperos hasta supervivientes trolls, bienvenidos a Dead by Daylight uno de mis juegos favoritos.

La mec√°nica del juego es sencilla un asesino deber√° dar caza a 4 supervivientes que deber√°n completar 5 generadores, pero a esta mec√°nica le agregas una sustancia llamada toxicidad, venganza, enojo y por supuesto creerse gracioso, da como resultado ciertas peculiaridades como insultos, reportes, muchos reportes. ¬øPor qu√© lo digo?

Comencemos desde el principio.

Al principio escoger√°s ser superviviente, te aterraran los asesinos, gritaras cuando Ghosface este asomado vi√©ndote o Michael Myers te de un golpe mientras hac√≠as felizmente un generador. Ser√°s ego√≠sta dejando morir a tu equipo o iras con miedo por todo el mapa, es normal todos empezamos as√≠.

Un d√≠a mejoraras, aprender√°s a esquivar, el asesino te ignorara porque eres un pesado y no te dejas dar amor, ya nada te dar√° miedo, ser√°s intr√©pido con tu linterna dando caza al asesino cuando trate levantar a tus compa√±eros, har√°s body block, romper√°s ganchos hasta que el asesino se enoje de verdad y te cuelgue campe√°ndote frente de tuya, mientras tu equipo se va dej√°ndote morir, esto suceder√° muchas veces caus√°ndote una ruptura dentro de ti, algo abra cambiado dentro de ti.

Por eso decidir√°s ir a modo asesino en busca de satisfacer ese enojo que recorre dentro de ti, matando a todo superviviente que te insultara en el chat o te reportara cuando termine la partida hasta que llegue el momento de encontrarse alguien como t√∫, una persona intr√©pida que buscara molestarte con la linterna, rompi√©ndote ganchos hasta que termines haciendo lo que una vez te hicieron a ti, as√≠ es campearas solo por enojo.

Un juego que te sacara miles de emociones, sobre todo te ense√±ara que eres una persona vengativa y misericordiosa cuando veas a los supervivientes agachados enfrente de ti pidi√©ndote perd√≥n.
Todo es mas divertido cuando lo juegas acompa√±ado porque hay m√°s coordinaci√≥n y si‚Ä¶ mucho troleo hasta que provoques la desconexi√≥n del asesino, pero no te preocupes que tu karma llegara cuando decidas ir como asesino.

En resumidas cuentas: Un juego bastante divertido el que te llevara a conocer tus m√°s sentidas emociones.

As much as I love this game, I've never seen a team of devs actively hate their playerbase more than BHVR has lol

I really enjoy the game as killer. I cant stand it as survivor. 

But I absolutely despise players/survivors that gen rush and just waste my time. Like hello? I have challenges to do. You pulling a Epic Mount and pre-cuXXing all over the round is sooo boring. Paint drying is more fun than a gen rushing group.

All that drama aside, I love the game. I like the changes they've been making. I like the updated graphics. I don't like the 'battle pass'. There's too many battle passes around the gaming world. It's over bearing. I miss the days when you could earn skins by actually playing and doing quests, not paying money for a level system that takes too long to fill up.

I'm an adult I have a life away from my pc.

So each time this game updates I've had to verify files because other wise the game refuses to work and will kick me out of it for "tampered files" this most recant patch it has verified through steam that nothing is tampered with and waits until mid match to disconnect me, all of this with a toxic community and inexcusable grind, game is a pile of trash. Ive been streaming this for months and it has a lot of potential but that means nothing if the dev's anticheat (which i might add doesn't actually stop cheaters) continues to false flag and render the game unplayable. I'm sick of the devs of this game not caring about those that have thrown so much money at them.

This is one of those games that if you win, you are ABSOLUTELY going to queue again. If you lose, maybe take a break, maybe not play again for the rest of the day or month. It depends on how brutal.

Playing the killer is certainly extremely difficult even when new ones are OP. You can easily get turned into a joke. This shouldn't mean to discourage because that's how you will have to eventually get good at the game - making mistakes. 

The real truth is that the game is exceptionally well balanced. Some killers are easy for noobs, some killers seems stupid and difficult to noobs but are OP for experienced players - they have something for everything and that goes for the survivors as well. 

When the game is not well balanced (arguably there hasn't been a time but anyways), the devs are quick to make it balanced. They seem to understand whats going on in the community, from my experience. 

Nothing has made my heart beat faster or harder than this fucking game. It's exhilarating. 

I would rate this something out of 10 but the game is more than a number, not sure how to put that.
This is the best game that is there
